---
title: "Viz in R Class"
author: "LTC Melanie Vinton"
date: "December 6, 2017"
output: html_document
---

This is a visualization module from an Introduction to R course taught by analysts at the Center for Army Analysis.  The focus is on using the **ggplot2** package.  The data used was dowloaded from GDELT, <http://www.gdeltproject.com>.  The module is written using a bookdown format.
